text:
="preserve">Clarence Malcolm Simpson (26 September 1933 – 7 December 2020) was a New Zealand cyclist. He represented his country at the 1952 Olympic Games. In the 1950 British Empire Games, he came sixth in the 1 km time trial. Simpson was born in Auckland.
Simpson died in Takapuna on 7 December 2020 at the age of 87.
